review:
Dr Shiv tej is best paediatrician...He had treated my son and we had follow ups with him..We are regularly visiting the doctor for our child vaccination and checkups. He is very friendly and cooperative. And  he listens to all your queries before giving his advice. When it comes to children we always require a doctor who is always ready to attend your calls...best doctor and best advice and treatment was given on right time..found him very knowledgeable, patient and is always ready for extending his help. He is a great human being.Our family is very much thankful to team..I strongly recommend him .
Best intesiviest....thank you doctor

I had taken my 4year old daughter,as she was suffering from high grade fever with pain abdomen.. I had consulted other paediatrician they got multiple blood test.. evrything was normal .. then I found Dr shiv tej  on ovum website and consulted him.doctor was very polite and humble and he had so much patience to listen about my daughter illness.. he said since all blood test is done , I just want to get urine test done because he suspected my daughter might be having urinary tract infection and that was true. My daughter received a course of antibiotic and now she is doing well..
All thanks to this humble doctor. Strongly recommend him
